§ Sala

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Sala** is a character from **18**.

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

**Sala** is a **Marid** — **Marid** are very powerful species, with the powers to grant wishes.

§§ Inspiration

The inspiration for the name of the **Sala** character from **18** comes from the words of a (ficticous) //magical incantation// from the song named //The Magic Song//:

― sala-gadoola-menchicka-boola bibbidi-bobbidi-boo
